# `<ViewAnnotation />`

ViewAnnotation represents a one-dimensional shape located at a single geographical coordinate.<br/><br/>Consider using GeoJSONSource and SymbolLayer instead, if you have many points, and you have static images,<br/>they'll offer much better performance.<br/><br/>If you need interactive views please use Marker,<br/>as with ViewAnnotation on Android child views are rendered onto a bitmap for better performance.

## Props

| Prop           |                      Type                      |  Default   | Required | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| -------------- | :--------------------------------------------: | :--------: | :------: | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `id`           |                    `string`                    |   `none`   | `false`  | A string that uniquely identifies the annotation.<br/>If not provided, a unique ID will be generated automatically.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `title`        |                    `string`                    |   `none`   | `false`  | The string containing the annotation's title. Note this is required to be set if you want to see a callout appear on iOS.                                                                                                                                                                |
| `snippet`      |                    `string`                    |   `none`   | `false`  | The string containing the annotation's snippet(subtitle). Not displayed in the default callout.                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `selected`     |                   `boolean`                    |   `none`   | `false`  | Manually selects/deselects annotation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `draggable`    |                   `boolean`                    |  `false`   | `false`  | Enable or disable dragging.<br/><br/>@default false                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `lngLat`       |                    `LngLat`                    |   `none`   |  `true`  | The center point (specified as a map coordinate) of the annotation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `anchor`       |                    `Anchor`                    | `"center"` | `false`  | Specifies the anchor being set on a particular point of the annotation.<br/>The anchor indicates which part of the marker should be placed closest to the coordinate.<br/><br/>@default "center"<br/><br/>@see https://maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/docs/API/type-aliases/PositionAnchor/ |
| `offset`       |                  `PixelPoint`                  |   `none`   | `false`  | The offset in pixels to apply relative to the anchor.<br/>Negative values indicate left and up.<br/><br/>@default [0, 0]<br/><br/>@see https://maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/docs/API/type-aliases/MarkerOptions/#offset                                                                   |
| `onSelected`   |                     `func`                     |   `none`   | `false`  | This callback is fired once this annotation is selected.<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `onDeselected` |                     `func`                     |   `none`   | `false`  | This callback is fired once this annotation is deselected.<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `onDragStart`  |                     `func`                     |   `none`   | `false`  | This callback is fired once this annotation has started being dragged.<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                            |
| `onDragEnd`    |                     `func`                     |   `none`   | `false`  | This callback is fired once this annotation has stopped being dragged.<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                            |
| `onDrag`       |                     `func`                     |   `none`   | `false`  | This callback is fired while this annotation is being dragged.<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `style`        |              `ViewProps["style"]`              |   `none`   | `false`  | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `children`     | `ReactElement \| [ReactElement, ReactElement]` |   `none`   |  `true`  | Expects one child, and an optional callout can be added as well                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `ref`          |                     `Ref`                      |   `none`   | `false`  | Ref to access ViewAnnotation methods.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
